column5: Maybe a naive question:  If I buy a ipad in the states with WiFi and 3G will all the features work on my network in Canada?
should work no mater where you are.Both search out available connections anywhere you are.
Well my iPhone works in Canada and the states...  I just get charged roaming in the USA...  So I imagine youd be good
Just get a sim card here and you'll be good to go
